mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONFERENCE(workspace_id, owner_user_workspace_id, subject, content) VALUES (#{workspaceId}, #{ownerUserWorkspaceId}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.workspace_id, B.workspace_name, C.user_id as ownerId, C.nick, C.color, A.subject, A.content FROM CONFERENCE A JOIN WORKSPACE B ON A.workspace_id = B.id LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_WORKSPACE C ON A.owner_user_workspace_id = C.id WHERE A.id = #{conferenceId}

SELECT A.id, A.workspace_id, B.workspace_name, C.user_id as ownerId, C.nick, C.color, A.subject, A.content FROM CONFERENCE A JOIN WORKSPACE B ON A.workspace_id = B.id LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_WORKSPACE C ON A.owner_user_workspace_id = C.id WHERE A.workspace_id = #{workspaceId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CONFERENCE SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{conferenceId}
